entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:22 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:22 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
